subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The home team needs one singles victory after Tomas Berdych and Radek Stepanek rallied to beat Marcel Granollers and Marc Lopez over Spain in four sets in Prague.
snippet: The home team needs one singles victory after Tomas Berdych and Radek Stepanek rallied to beat Marcel Granollers and Marc Lopez over Spain in four sets in Prague.
